item.title: Jessica add a quote by Henry Peter Brougham
item.description: "Education makes a people easy to lead, but difficult to drive; easy to govern, but impossible to enslave." -- Henry Peter Brougham

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Be awesome! Be a book nut!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jessica add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Jessica add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures. Simple in actions and thoughts, you return to the source of being. Patient with both friends and enemies, you accord with the way things are. Compassionate toward yourself, you reconcile all beings in the world." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "A man with outward courage dares to die; a man with inner courage dares to live." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Laozi
item.description:
"Love
Embracing Tao, you become embraced. Supple, breathing gently, you become reborn. Clearing your vision, you become clear. Nurturing your beloved, you become impartial. Opening your heart, you become accepted. Accepting the World, you embrace Tao. Bearing and nurturing, Creating but not owning, Giving without demanding, Controlling without authority, This is love." -- Laozi
